summary: Another in my line of \'Crests Mods\' this time for the Maclean Clan in Scotland :)
descriptionHtml:
EDIT:
1.1 is up, fixed the mirror image on the shield.

a while ago i began the idea of a \'Crests Mod\' by re-texturing Whiterun guards to carry my own coat of arms, found below:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2722

then it continued with the Bauer family crest:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3080

and now it also contains the Clan Maclean :) obviously this has a very scottish theme (perfect seeing as im currently still in the process of completing my \'Tartan Stormcloaks\') this pack replaces the city of Dawnstar, i hope thats OK MalakaiV? but you didnt mention which city you wanted... if you want it for a different city, just re-name the files parts that say \'dawnstar\' into a different city name.

Feel free to make requests for your own Coat of arms to replace a cities colors by simply sending me a PM or commenting on here with a link to your crest, your preffered colors and which city you want replaced.

Callaghan04
author: Callaghan04
